title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

To deter theft of his or her motor vehicle, a registrant
may participate in the Watch Your Car auto theft prevention program established
by this Part. The presence of a Watch Your Car decal on a motor vehicle shall
identify that vehicle as one that is not normally operated between 1 a.m. and 5
a.m. or driven across or in proximity of international land borders or
ports. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
72.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
